justification: Acknowledges B’s preference for low-variance pocket QBs and steady vets, but ignores B already has a Tier 1 QB and values RB workloads—making Alex White unlikely to be moved for depth. A is 0-8 yet targets a Doubtful RB and an Out TE, contradicting urgent win needs. The TE is mislabeled as ‘usable.’ Rationale is brief and not grounded in roster context or injuries.
